resources.string: dissapointed woman and the man separated by a door
Get rid of confusion with other people
Sometimes usual matters of communication doesn’t work and it’s hard to remain calm and happy...\nThis app will make your words simpler to others
ellipses, showing current screen, now the first
No need to write long texts
You don’t have to write even average text blocks, just take a photo of what you need or tell it to voice assistant
ellipses, showing current screen, now the second
Application interface designed to become friendly for any kind of users, even for people with disabilities
